remarks: The intersection of a set of atoms and its polarity is empty. Definition of nonsingular in [Holland95] p. 214.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2polat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2polat.p $e |- P = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pnonsingN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( X i^i ( P ` X ) ) = (/) ) $.
